import Filter from "./Filter"; import React, { useState, useContext } from "react"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal"; import AppContext from "../context/appContext"; function FilterModal() { const { type, setType, items, setItems, color, setColor, size, setSize, price, setPrice, gender, setGender, } = useContext(AppContext); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return ( <> Modal heading
Item setType(e.target.value)} autoFocus /> Color setColor(e.target.value)} autoFocus /> Catrgory setGender(e.target.value)} autoFocus /> Size setSize(e.target.value)} placeholder="Sizes" autoFocus /> Price setPrice(e.target.value)} placeholder="Price" autoFocus />
{items.map((item) => (

{item.item} - {item.gender} - {item.size} - {item.color} -{" "} {item.price}

))}
); } export default FilterModal;
